title: Resources
text: This page provides resources for the MOTION-BIDS project.

title: Resources
text:
MOTION-BIDS specification
The MOTION-BIDS specification is available on the MOTION-BIDS documentation website.

title: Resources
text:
Preprint
The preprint of the MOTION-BIDS paper is available on OSF.

title: Authors
text: Sein is investigating human spatial cognition using mobile EEG at the Berlin Mobile Brain-Body Imaging Lab & Doellerlab. She is a dedicated Open Science enthusiast!

title: Authors
text: Sein is investigating human spatial cognition using mobile EEG at the Berlin Mobile Brain-Body Imaging Lab & Doellerlab. She is a dedicated Open Science enthusiast!

title: Authors
text:
Julius Welzel
Julius has completed his masters in 2019 in Cognitive Neuropsychology in Oldenburg, Germany and is still pursuing his PhD in Kiel, Germany where he started building a Open Science EEG lab based in the deparment of Neurology. He has a daughter which you can meet at conferences or in one of his many Zoom calls.
